title: The Reason I was a Villainess - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Cunning Protagonist   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse R*pe   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Sayokichi (Sayo Shimori)   作者 さよ吉（詩森さよ）
description:
I am Marianna of the Duke of La-Tour . I was reincarnated as a Villainess.

It seems that I was reincarnated into the world of an Otome Game that I played in my previous life, but even if I use my knowledge, my death flags may or may not be broken.......

So I'm going to live my life seriously and sincerely as a Young Noble Lady. >
